# bathtub cig

> Intimate depression pop from Minneapolis

## About

Bathtub cig is the intimate depression pop project of Hilary James. Born in a Minneapolis bedroom, it is an honest attempt at coping with her long struggle with mental health. She is joined by Dave Power on drums, Skyler Nowinski on bass, and Hannah Heble on synth, flute and harmony.

## Discography

- **"Good Mourning, I Love you"** (2024 EP) - About love during a time of immense grief
- **"Red Pine"** (2024 Single) - A determinedly joyous sapphic bop about falling in love
- **"Night Blindness"** (2022 Full Length) - A clever and dark Gen Z Ode
- **"bed"** (2021 EP) - Dream-like musing on quarantine and grief
- **"Old Light"** (2018 EP) - Debut EP, synth-pop with raw lyrics

## Genre & Style

Depression pop, indie pop, synth pop, intimate pop. Compared to Frankie Cosmo, Big Thief. Raw, honest lyrics about mental health, grief, love, and identity.

## Key Themes

- Mental health and depression
- Grief and loss
- Queer/sapphic love
- Authenticity and vulnerability
- Gen Z experiences

## Band Members

- **Hilary James** - Vocals, Guitar, Songwriting
- **Dave Power** - Drums
- **Skyler Nowinski** - Bass
- **Hannah Heble** - Synth, Flute, Harmony

## Press Highlights

Critics have described bathtub cig's music as "an exceptional piece of art" with "gorgeous vocals and some guitar work with a bit of a Big Thief quality that expands and delights with an emotional sensitivity."

## Location

Based in Minneapolis, Minnesota
